(Nuttall ex Torrey & A. Gray) A. Gray

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family brassicaceae;tribe physarieae;genus physaria;species lepidota;subspecies lepidota

bio:treatment.description: Trichomes: rays fused nearly to tips. Basal leaves: blades elliptic, apex usually obtuse. Fruits: sinuses deep, or shallow basally, deep apically. 2n = 16.
Clay soil of road cuts, clayey knolls, steep chiprock slides, shalelike rocky outcrops, pinyon-juniper areas.
